text: @realDonaldTrump Yesterday, you said parents who are fearful abt COVID-19 & sending their children into schools should be replaced for making "terrible" parenting decisions for wanting to protect their kids. You're a danger to America's children & parents #TrumpKillsChildren #TrumpWillKillUsAll https://t.co/91K0pNk1yV
